channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Galaxies die earlier than expected
item.description: For a long time, scientists thought that only actively star-forming galaxies should be observed in the very early Universe. The James Webb space teles...

item.title: Asteroid impact threat estimates improved for the Earth and the Moon
item.description: An international team is currently closely tracking the near-Earth asteroid 2024 YR4. The impact probability estimates for the year 2032 has been redu...

item.title: Retinal therapy may restore lost vision
item.description: Researchers have successfully developed a novel drug to restore vision. The treatment method restores vision through retinal nerve regeneration.

item.title: Being physically active, even just a couple of days a week, may be key to better health

item.title: Seeing humanity's transition from hunting to farming as a cultural shift

item.title: Cutting-edge air quality monitoring strengthens public health nationwide
